subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Colorado pinch-hitter Charlie Culberson hit a two-run homer in the bottom of the ninth to hand the Mets a loss on a night when they had season highs in hits and runs.
snippet: Colorado pinch-hitter Charlie Culberson hit a two-run homer in the bottom of the ninth to hand the Mets a loss on a night when they had season highs in hits and runs.
